definition: towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: Sampras run forward to hit an overhead shot.
sentences.chinese: 桑普拉斯跑向前打了一個過頭球。

sentences.english: The holy stream of thy music breaks through all stony obstacles and rushes on.
sentences.chinese: 這音樂的聖流沖垮堅固的阻障，奔湧向前。

sentences.english: Don't push the face down, but use the body to drive the head forward.
sentences.chinese: 別推下來，但使用面對身體來驅動頭向前。

sentences.english: This assessment also influenced ELS' approach to growth going forward.
sentences.chinese: 這項評估同時也影響了ELS的向前增長的方式。

sentences.english: And, that radius rotates around the wheel as the wheel is moving forward.
sentences.chinese: 這條半徑隨着車輪的向前移動在旋轉着。

sentences.english: Rotate the left arm forward while inhaling.
Water splashed near his shoe-tops as he moved forward.
sentences.chinese: 他向前走的時候，水花在他的鞋尖附近飛濺着。

sentences.english: So I was looking straight my oh myeadvertising cfeelpaign as I responded.
sentences.chinese: 於是作爲迴應我也直直地向前看着。

sentences.english: Jack gets up and advances toward Victor.
sentences.chinese: 傑克站了起來，向前走向維克多。

sentences.english: The pumice flow deposit begins from its bottom, and gradually develops forward.
sentences.chinese: 堆積過程是從浮巖流底部漸進式向前堆積。

sentences.english: It is no use raking over the past, let us look ahead to the future.
sentences.chinese: 翻老賬沒用，讓我們向前看眼望未來吧。

sentences.english: When pulled forward, tip of ear should just cover the eye.
sentences.chinese: 如果向前拉，耳尖剛好蓋住眼睛。

sentences.english: Butterfly forward movement is caused by arm pull and hip movement upwards.
sentences.chinese: 蝶向前是靠拉臂上提臀促成。

sentences.english: That formerly how to pick, time flies straight forward.
sentences.chinese: 翀那段從前怎麼去撿，光陰似箭一直向前。

sentences.english: The villagers rushed down the street. Lorian was lost in the midst of them.
sentences.chinese: 村民們沿着街道向前湧去，洛裏安也消失在人羣中。

sentences.english: I lean forward to pick one up, except that I can't.
sentences.chinese: 我傾身向前想要拿起一個，只是我不能。

definition: to go forward/to forge ahead/to advance/onward
upward/up/to advance/to try to improve oneself/to make progress
from now on/in the future/time to come
to recoil/to draw back/to fall back/to retreat
to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
